setVerboseLoggingEnabled(boolean).Description: Enables or disables verbose logging for this Cast session. This option is provided to aid in testing and debugging, and should not be enabled in release builds.

build().Description: Builds a CastOptions with the arguments supplied to this builder.

ClassDesc: A builder to create an instance of @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast#CastOptions_E@ to set API configuration parameters for @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast_E@.
